title: Bug 23267: Import Project should have a default folder
description: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, a dialog is displayed that does not have a good default folder. This makes it inconvenient for users to locate the project they want to import.
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog does not display a default folder for selecting the project.
EB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should display a default folder that corresponds to the current workspace, making it easier for users to locate the project they want to import.
